attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-1290

Date: 2014-11-21

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Salvatore (Sam) Barone, Vice-Chairperson and Member, Canadian Transportation Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 7 ($198,900 - $233,900), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Dominique M. Bellemare, Vice-Chairperson (General Division - Employment Insurance Section) and Member, Social Security Tribunal, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 5 ($141,300 - $166,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Renata Brum Bozzi, Senior Judge, Citizenship Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($123,000 - $144,600), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Benjamin R. Dolin, Acting Deputy Chairperson and Member (Immigration Appeal Division), Immigration and Refugee Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 5 ($141,300 - $166,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Susheel Gupta, former Acting Chairperson, Canadian Human Rights Tribunal, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective April 1, 2014 to September 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Denis Jolette, Vice-Chairperson and Member (Appeal Division), Parole Board of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 5 ($141,300 - $166,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Thomas J. Kaye, Vice-Chairperson and Member (Ontario Regional Division), Parole Board of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 5 ($141,300 - $166,200), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of David William Langtry, Acting Chief Commissioner, Canadian Human Rights Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Deborah Ann Grace Morrish, Acting Deputy Chairperson and Member (Refugee Appeal Division), Immigration and Refugee Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($172,900 - $203,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of David Paul Olsen, former Acting Chairperson, Public Service Labour Relations Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 7 ($198,900 - $233,900), effective April 1, 2014 to July 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Owen J. W. Parkhouse, former Interim Deputy Chairperson, Veterans Review and Appeal Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($123,000 - $144,600), effective April 1, 2014 to July 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Ken S. Sandhu, Acting Chairperson and Member, Immigration and Refugee Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Lucie Tedesco, Commissioner, Financial Consumer Agency of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Scott Tessier, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador Offshore Petroleum Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 8 ($228,400 - $268,700), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Patric Francis Whyte, Full-time Vice-Chairperson, Canada Industrial Relations Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($172,900 - $203,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Ed Williams, Vice-Chairman and Member, Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador Offshore Petroleum Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($172,900 - $203,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of William Brooks, Commissioner for Federal Judicial Affairs, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($172,900 - $203,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of John R. Pecman, Commissioner of Competition, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 9 ($262,600 - $308,900), effective April 1, 2014.
